What are the treatments for lactate dehydrogenase deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of lactate dehydrogenase deficiency:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Glycogen storage disease XI  - Genetic Testing Registry: Lactate dehydrogenase B deficiency  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: LDH Isoenzymes  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Lactate Dehydrogenase Test   These resources from MedlinePlus offer
